src_original: dharme dharmânudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /  yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ /
yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ /
sa sarvadharmâniḥsaraṇam iti viditvânāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
eṣām eva kleśānām avabodhād bodhiḥ /  yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatîti //
